title: Wherever You Will Go
lyrics:
[intro] (D)  (A)  (Bm)  (G)                                                               
 
(D) So lately (A) you're wondering (Bm) who will be (G)there to take my place
(D) When I'm gone (A) you'll need love (Bm) to light the (G)shadows on your face
(D) If a (A)great wave shall (Bm)fall and (G)fall upon us all
(D) Then bet(A)ween sand and (Bm)stone could you (G)make it on your own?
 
 
(D) If I could (A) then I would (Bm) I'll go wher(G)ever you will go
(D) Way up high (A) or down low (Bm) I'll go wher(G)ever you will go
 
 
(D) Maybe (A) I'll find out (Bm) a way to (G)make it back someday
(D) To want you (A) to guide you (Bm) through the (G)darkest of your days
(D) If a (A)great wave shall (Bm)fall and (G)fall upon us (D)all
Then I (A)hope there's someone (Bm)out there who can (G)bring me back to you
 
(D) If I could (A) then I would (Bm) I'll go wher(G)ever you will go
(D) Way up high (A) or down low (Bm) I'll go wher(G)ever you will (Bm)go
(G)Run away with my (A)heart
(Gbm)Run away with my (Bm)hope
(G)Run away with my (A)love (Gbm)  (A)
 
(D) I know now (A) just quite how (Bm) my life and (G)love might still go on
(D) In your heart (A) in your mind (Bm) I'll stay with (G)you for all of time
 
(D) If I could (A) then I would (Bm) I'll go wher(G)ever you will go
(D) Way up high (A) or down low (Bm) I'll go wher(G)ever you will go
(D) If I could (A)turn back (Bm)time I'll go wher(G)ever you will go
(D) If I could (A)make you (Bm)mine I'll go wher(G)ever you will gooo(D)ooooo
(A)  (Bm) I'll go wher(G)ever you will goooo(D)oooo
(A)  (Bm)  (G) 
(D-single strum) [end]
